MIU CV Builder Home Tab 2
Hello blank fragment
//About Me Highly motivated and technically skilled Java developer with 3 years of hands on experience solving complex software problems built to specification using best practices. An additional 4 years of civil engineering experience. Excellent skills in implementing modern technologies such as Java, Spring, Spring boot, Hibernate, JPA, JavaScript, jQuery, RESTFUL API, MySQL and MongoDB ensuring use of industry best standards. Knowledgeable in Agile/Scrum based SDLC methodologies. Expert team player focused on maximizing production in minimum time and minimum cost. I can be too critical of myself. A pattern I’ve noticed throughout my career is that I often feel I could have done more, even if objectively, I’ve done well. Earlier in my career, this led to burnout and negative self-talk. One solution I’ve implemented over the last three years is to actively pause and celebrate my achievements. Not only has this helped my own self-esteem, but it has also helped me genuinely appreciate and recognize my team and other support systems. I’m thorough and tenacious. When I’m on a project, I keep track of the details. Because I have a comprehensive understanding of the components, I can spot the essentials and rigorously advocate for them to meet deadlines. I regularly see this reflected in my peer and management feedback. Master of Science in Computer Science 

 (Completed Course Studies, Graduating Dec 2020) 

 Maharishi International University – Fairfield, Iowa

 Key Courses: Fundamental Programming Practices, Modern Programming Practices, Web Application Programming, Web Application Architecture, Modern Web Application, Advanced Software development, Software Engineering, Algorithm, Enterprise Architecture, Database Management System, Machine learning. 

 Bachelor of Science in Engineering

 University Of Asmara, Eritrea.
